description:
Anyone want to go off the beaten path with me?
Jonny is a hard working construction worker who didn't get paid for his last job, wrecked his car, and lost his wallet, all in one week.
Despite being straight, he was eager to try anything.
And I wanted to try something completely different than the other sites. Edit a little more creatively and do something...uh..edgy.
Just don't blink while you watch this movie. The previews definitely (deliberately) don't tell the whole story. In fact, I really didn't even want to put previews up, but hey, I gotta sell memberships!
title: Bryan & Jonny Colson - Edge
